name: Jumbl
description:
Jumble is a chillout physics puzzler about a wooden ball trying to reach its destination. The only control is jumping in the direction of the arrow. Sounds easy! It's probably more difficult than you would expect. Give it a play and let me know what you think!

Controls:

Touch or click anywhere to jump
Buttons do button things
Press Esc from the main menu to exit the game

**If you have a keyboard, you can use the space bar in place of clicking and the R key in place of restart**

Special thanks to Nildolf (aka my little bro) for level design
